description: '''Neue Deutsche Todeskunst''' ('''NDT''', {{lit}} "New German Death Art") is a musical genre that developed in Germany in the late 1980s. It is credited with establishing the German language in the [[dark wave]] movement, although there were already such German bands as [[Xmal Deutschland]], {{ill|Geisterfahrer|de|Geisterfahrer (Band)}}, and [[Malaria!]].
